name: Kumo Ink
overview:
Kumo Ink is a customer focused, best value, design agency offering a range of products and services to small and medium sized businesses. Based in Livingston, West Lothian, and are please to serve a customer base across West Lothian, the Scottish Central Belt, Fife and the Borders.

With state of the art facilities and an experienced and enthusiastic team, the business delivers a tailored design experience to businesses and individuals. The services are designed to be cost effective, helping customers to achieve great looking marketing material and websites for less.

The company creates a wide range of design, printing, marketing and websites that can be tailored to individual requirements, helping to improve business and personal image. The products include professional and creative advice, making them perfect for a wide range of customers, which are available by booking online or popping into the studio at Centrex House, Livingston, West Lothian
